header.title: Welcome!
header.description: Create your password to access Rakuten's Publisher Center.
form.newPassword.label: New Password
form.confirmPassword.label: Confirm Your New Password
validation.newPassword.min: The new password must be at least 6 characters long!
validation.confirmPassword.min: Confirmation must be at least 6 characters long!
validation.confirmPassword.notMatch: The new password and confirmation must match!
toast.permission.error.message: You don't have permission to access the publisher app!
toast.permission.error.description: Please check with an administrator about your permissions.
toast.unexpected.error.message: An error occurred while updating your password!
